name: Stone Maze (DJJohns)
description:
A simple (in terms of game mechanics) maze game. Navigate the paths, passageways and staircases to reach the flag.

Controls

  • WASD to Move
  • Mouse to Look
  • Q/E to turn light on/off

The maze started out as a pencil and paper design intended to be solved by eye; however the eight floor structure of the maze proved to complex to draw and I decided to try turning it into a game. Since I had experience with Blender I built the game in UPBGE.
